name: roastyHUD
tagline: A custom TF2 HUD created by Toasty, a combination of other great HUDs all rolled into one.
body:
--------------------------------
roastyHUD v3 (31.08.2014)
--------------------------------

Created by: [Toasty](http://steamcommunity.com/id/toasty666)

Steam Group: [Click here](http://steamcommunity.com/groups/roastyhud)

Screenshots: [Click here](http://imgur.com/a/BiQjO)

--------------------------------
How to install
--------------------------------
Inside the archive you'll find a folder called "roastyHUD-master". Move it to the following location:

- Windows:  
~\Steam\steamapps\common\Team Fortress 2\tf\custom

- Mac:  
~/Library/Application Support/Steam/SteamApps/common/Team Fortress 2/tf/custom

- Linux:  
~/.local/share/Steam/SteamApps/common/Team Fortress 2/tf/custom

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
MAY NOT SUPPORT MAC/LINUX and aspect ratios other than 16:9 (testing required)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
------------------------------
CREDIT:
------------------------------
This HUD is a combination of parts from my personal favourite custom HUDs rolled into one. 
These other HUDS include:

-e.v.e HUD (Main Menu, taunt menu stylized to fit with OmpHUD)

-notoHUD (3D Models)

-OmpHUD (Original base of roastyHUD)

-broeselhud (Weapon and Ammo based on broesel's)
